label: Jaiswara, Ranjana & Laure Desutter-Grandcolas.  2014. Revision of the genus Pteroplistes in India, with the description of two new species Pteroplistes kervasae Jaiswara, n. sp. and Pteroplistes masinagudi Jaiswara, n. sp. (Orthoptera, Grylloidea, Pteroplistinae). Zootaxa 3814(1): 96–108.
